addressIsDelegate(uint256,address).details: Checks if a user is delegate in a specific group.

params._groupId: The group ID of the group to check.

returns.isDelegate: Returns true if the user has delegated in the group, false otherwise.

becameMemberOfGroup(uint256).details: Gives permission to vote in a group.

params._group: The group ID to give permission to vote in.

becomeDelegate(uint256).details: Allows a user to become a delegate in a specific group.

params._groupId: The group ID of the group the delegate is a delegate in.

delegate(uint256,address).details: Allows a user to delegate their vote to a delegate in a specific group.

params._delegateTo: The address of the delegate to delegate to.
params._groupId: The group ID of the group the delegate is a delegate in.

getGroupsUserIsMemberIn().details: Retrieves all groups that the user has permission to vote in.

returns.groups: Returns an array of group IDs that the user has permission to vote in.

hasDelegatedInGroup(uint256).details: Checks if a user has delegated in a specific group.

params._groupId: The group ID of the group to check.

returns._0: hasDelegated Returns true if the user has delegated in the group, false otherwise.

hasDelegatedToDelegateInGroup(uint256,ad.details: Checks if a user has delegated to a specific delegate in a specific group.

params._delegate: The address of the delegate to check.
params._groupId: The group ID of the group to check.

returns._0: hasDelegated Returns true if the user has delegated to the delegate in the group, false otherwise.

isUserMemberOfGroup(uint256).details: Checks if a user has permission to vote in a group.

returns.hasRight: Returns true if the user has permission to vote in the group, false otherwise.

removeDelegation(address,uint256).details: Allows a user to remove a delegation in a specific group.

params._delegate: The address of the delegate to remove the delegation from.
params._groupId: The group ID of the group the delegate is a delegate in.

removeGroupMembership(uint256).details: Removes permission to vote in a group.

params._group: The group ID to remove permission to vote in.

resignAsDelegate(uint256).details: Allows a user to resign as a delegate in a specific group.

params._groupId: The group ID of the group the delegate is a delegate in.
